org.fedoraproject.fedmsg

Class FedmsgMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fedoraproject.fedmsg.FedmsgMessage

  • public final class FedmsgMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    An unsigned fedmsg message. You likely never want to send this over the bus (unless you are debugging/developing). Instead you want to send SignedFedmsgMessage which includes the signature and certificate. You can convert this to a SignedFedmsgMessage by calling sign(File, File).
    See Also:
    SignedFedmsgMessage
